trans-unit.target: TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_1<tab>Honored traveler, I bid you welcome to the Bokairo Inn.

TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_2<tab>A thousand pardons, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but we cannot provide accommodations for you at this time, as all rooms are currently occupied. We thank you for your understanding.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_Q1_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A1_000_1<tab>Ask about the Bokairo Inn.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A1_000_2<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_3<tab>The Bokairo Inn is the first choice for accommodations for the countless merchants and dignitaries who pass through the port of Kugane.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_4<tab>In addition to our immaculate rooms, guests are free to avail themselves of the Bokaisen Hot Springs. Our ijin clients tend to find the experience...revelatory.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_5<tab>Alas, we are at full capacity at present. You may be assured that I will reserve the next available room for you.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_6<tab>We thank you for your patience.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_10<tab>Honored traveler, I bid you welcome to the Bokairo Inn. Do you require accommodations?
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_Q2_000_1<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A2_000_1<tab>Retire to an inn room.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A2_000_3<tab>Ask about inn rules.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A2_000_4<tab>Ask about the Bokairo Inn.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_A2_000_5<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_11<tab>As you wish. Allow me to show you to your room. And may I say that I have the utmost confidence that you will not be disappointed...
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_17<tab>Many of our guests come here to cleanse the mind and body of impurities. A measure of peace and quiet is therefore essential.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_18<tab>Certain...activities that you may be tempted to engage in while enjoying the privacy of your room are strictly prohibited. A thousand pardons.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_SYSTEM_000_18<tab>Synthesis, repairs, and materia melding cannot be performed inside inn rooms.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_19<tab>The Bokairo Inn is the first choice for accommodations for the countless merchants and dignitaries who pass through the port of Kugane.
TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_20<tab>In addition to our immaculate rooms, guests are free to avail themselves of the Bokaisen Hot Springs. Our ijin clients tend to find the experience...revelatory.

TEXT_WARPINNKUGANE_USHITORA_000_21<tab>If you wish to stay with us this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>, you need only ask, and I will show you to a room at once.
